content: cross stitch or you could round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet use little buttons or beads and lastly tie a round 3 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet loop of yarn or ribbon through the very top around 18 single_crochet of the head/hat for hanging you can hide round 4 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet this knot in the hat as well round 8 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet this design a written work and images are a copyright of ©stitches & fluff and may not be copied or reproduced in any way
